text: Ara yakhana amadera banibahakara lutera kache esechila, tini tadera jan'ya duhkhita hayechilena ebam tadera jan'ya asamartha mane karalena. Kintu tara balechila -- ''bhaya karo na ara duhkha'o karo na. Amara alabat tomake ud'dhara karaba ara tomara parijanabargake'o -- tomara strike byatita, se hacche pechane pare thakadera dalera.
